verses.name: Ezekiel 40:37
verses.text: And the posts thereof were toward the utter court; and palm trees were upon the posts thereof, on this side, and on that side: and the going up to it had eight steps.

verses.name: Ezekiel 40:38
verses.text: And the chambers and the entries thereof were by the posts of the gates, where they washed the burnt offering.

verses.name: Ezekiel 40:39
verses.text: And in the porch of the gate were two tables on this side, and two tables on that side, to slay thereon the burnt offering and the sin offering and the trespass offering.
